Camfranglais, Francanglais, ma ọ bụ Francamglais (portmanteau nke adjectives French camerounais, français, na anglais) bụ asụsụ obodo nke Cameroon, nke nwere ihe ụtọ asụsụ na okwu sitere na Cameroonian French, Cameroonian English na Cameroonic Pidgin English, na mgbakwunye na onyinye okwu sitere na asụsụ dị iche iche nke Cameroon.
Ngwakọta asụsụ a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị na-eto eto na mba ahụ, yana ndị na-asọ mpi Cameroonian Pidgin English ("Creole") dịka asụsụ asụsụ obodo a na-ahụkarị
Ọ kacha ewu ewu na etiti obodo mepere emepe ebe ekwe ntị na francophone na-ezukọ
Camfranglais ebutela nchegbu maka ndị nkuzi, ndị na-eche na ngwakọta asụsụ nwere ike igbochi inweta French na Bekee oge niile yana enwere ike ịhụ ya dị ka ụzọ mkpirisi gburugburu ezi asụsụ abụọ
Ọmụmụ na-aga n'ihu na Camfranglais, nke ụfọdụ ndị agụmakwụkwọ chere na ọ na-aga ịghọ asụsụ kwesịrị ekwesị.
